control_board_commands.function: let _hundreds = Math.floor(arguments[0]/100); let _tens = Math.floor((arguments[0] % 100) / 10); let _ones = Math.floor(arguments[0] % 10); return 'FE0501'+formatHex(_hundreds)+formatHex(_tens)+formatHex(_ones) + 'FF';
control_board_commands.name: Set Grill Temperature
